name: A Game Where You Fight Lots Of Spiders
name_original: A Game Where You Fight Lots Of Spiders
description:
An action, horror FPS prototype. Consists of two levels (About 10-20 minutes of gameplay), make your way to the end and escape the city to win the game.

Features multiple spider types and dynamic enemy spawns, so that each playthrough is somewhat different. 

A little rough around the edges but I don't plan on developing this game any further.
